Package com.o3dr.services.android.lib.drone.companion.solo.tlv

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ControllerMessageInputReport
    Created by djmedina on 4/15/15.
    SoloButtonSetting
    Base class for button mapping setting.
    SoloButtonSettingGetter
    Sent from app to Solo to request Button mapping setting.
    SoloButtonSettingSetter
    Sent from app to Solo to set a Button mapping setting.
    SoloCableCamOptions
    Sent from app to Solo or vice versa to transmit cable cam options.
    SoloCableCamWaypoint
    Send the app our cable cam waypoint when itâ€™s recorded.
    SoloFollowOptions
    Created by Fredia Huya-Kouadio on 5/24/15.
    SoloFollowOptionsV2
    Created by Fredia Huya-Kouadio on 12/29/15.
    SoloGoproConstants
    Stores the gopro constants Created by Fredia Huya-Kouadio on 10/15/15.
    SoloGoproRecord
    Issue a record command to the gopro in either video or stills mode.
    SoloGoproRequestState
    Created by Fredia Huya-Kouadio on 7/28/15.
    SoloGoproSetExtendedRequest
    Created by chavi on 11/16/15.
    SoloGoproSetRequest
    A set request message will be transmitted to the camera.
    SoloGoproState
    Created by Fredia Huya-Kouadio on 7/28/15.
    SoloGoproStateV2
    Encapsulate all state that an app might want to know about the GoPro in one packet.
    SoloMessageLocation
    Sent from app to solo to communicate a location.
    SoloMessageRecordPosition
    Sent from app to Solo to request recording of a position.
    SoloMessageShot
    Base class for the current shot set of solo messages.
    SoloMessageShotGetter
    Sent from solo to app when it enters a shot.
    SoloMessageShotManagerError
    Debugging tool - shotmanager sends this to the app when it has hit an exception.
    SoloMessageShotSetter
    Sent from app to solo to request that solo begin a shot.
    SoloPanoOptions
    Path: Bidirectional Purpose: App updates shotmanager of pano settings Shotmanager tells app to update UI based on pano settings changed through the controller Requires: Shotmanager 2.4.0 Created by phu 7/2016
    SoloPanoStatus
    Path: Bidirectional Purpose: App updates shotmanager on changes in zipline settings App can also controls automatic cruise movements by setting the cruise speed to positive or negative or zero Shotmanager tells app to update UI based on zipline settings changed through the controller Requires: Shotmanager 2.4.0 Created by phu 7/2016
    SoloPause
    Used by ShotManager or app to transmit a pause request.
    SoloReturnHomeLocationMessage
    Path: App to shotmanager Purpose: Sends an update of the user location as the home location for Return to Me Requires: Shotmanager 2.4.0 Created by phu 7/2016
    SoloRewindOptions
    Path: Bidirectional Purpose: Configures the options for failsafe behavior of shotmanager This can be sent at anytime to shotmanager, even outside of a shot Requires: shotmanager 2.4.0 Created by phu 7/2016
    SoloShotError
    Created by Fredia Huya-Kouadio on 4/13/15.
    SoloShotOptions
    Sent from app to Solo or vice versa to transmit selfie options.
    SoloZiplineLock
    Path: Bidirectional Purpose: App tells shotmanager to lock onto the path of the current copter heading for zipline Or shotmanager tells app that a path has been locked and transition the UI Requires: Shotmanager 2.4.0 Created by phu 7/2016
    SoloZiplineOptions
    Path: Bidirectional Purpose: App updates shotmanager on changes in zipline settings App can also controls automatic cruise movements by setting the cruise speed to positive or negative or zero Shotmanager tells app to update UI based on zipline settings changed through the controller Requires: Shotmanager 2.4.0 Created by phu 7/2016
    TLVMessageParser
    Utility class to generate tlv packet from received bytes.
    TLVMessageTypes
    All sololink messages types.
    TLVPacket
    All communication follows this TLV format in little endian.
